description_top: Computer Science student at Silesian University of Technology and Java developer. Mostly work in: Angular, Java SE/EE, Spring Framework/Boot, JPA, JSP/JSTL, FreeMarker, Hibernate, Liquibase, JPQL/SQL.
description_bottom: My main interests are business process automation and applied algorithms used for digital images processing (DIP/DSP). I have a fairly broad knowledge of Java and Typescript. I have basic knowledge of programming in C, C++, C#, PHP and Matlab. I am currently learning Scala.
